description: This file defines a utility function to create an entrypoint for MCP tools, including an asynchronous function to call the tool and process its content, handling different content types such as text, images, and embedded resources. It also manages external dependencies and logging.

methods.name: get_entrypoint_for_tool
methods.description: Creates and returns an asynchronous entrypoint function for an MCP tool, which calls the tool, processes its content, and handles different content types including text, images, and embedded resources.
